```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r, packages, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(jeksterslabRdatarepo)
library(knitr)
library(DT)
library(GGally)
library(plotly)
library(psych)
```

## Load Data

```{r, load}
data(
  svd,
  package = "jeksterslabRdatarepo"
)
svd <- as.data.frame(
  cbind(
  y = svd$y,
  svd$X
)
)
```

## Data Table

```{r, DT, echo = FALSE}
datatable(svd)
```

## Plots

### Scatter Plot Matrix

```{r, plot01, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
p <- ggpairs(
  data = svd
)
ggplotly(p)
```

## Descritive Statistics

```{r, descriptives01, echo = FALSE}
kable(
  x = summary(
    svd
  )
)
```

```{r, descriptives02, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
kable(
  x = describe(
    svd
  )
)
```
